name: Omnibang
description:
Search many websites right from browser's address bar using bangs provided by DuckDuckGo. A bang or bang-code is a shortcode for a website.

Type (don't paste) the general format "! bang-code search-term" and press Enter.

For example, "! a men shoes" will search for "men shoes" on amazon.com, whose bang-code is "a".

Click the Omnibang icon next to address bar for more info.

browser_action.default_title: Search many websites right from browser's address bar! Click icon for more info.
